website_summaries.verdict: It offers reliable bounce and grip, and the design is similar to that of other good contenders.
pros: Great features, and the price is low
cons: Doesn't come in all of the size options that some competitors do, but for the price, you might not mind

customer_reviews.title: Fifteen Pounds of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ball. Seems well made and like it will last a long time. Great texture/grip. Definitely on the hard side of the medicine ball spectrum; if you're looking for something softer go elsewhere. I should note a minor complaint: It's a bit larger than some other brands I've seen in stores. Maybe that's a feature for some people but it seems just a bit too bulky to me, especially at the 15lb level. Not enough of an issue for me to deduct a star, but worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: Adam MachanicTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, watch your toes!
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped that I wasn't biting off more than I could chew by getting the 25lb ball to start with, but I'm glad I did. This ball demands respect - the longer one holds it, the heavier the ball seems to get. Just try walking around the block with it! Great wrist workout among other things. Takes air like a basketball, bounces like an evil one, watch your toes! Box arrived in great condition, ball was securely packed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zeman

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: I now seem to have a family of Wacces Medicine Balls - these fit the need and are better than others I've tested. The grip is super, and the weight is perfectly centered. Using multiple weights over 2 weeks I eliminated my lower back issues quickly. Also using for core strength is easy and way more fun than other stuff. A++++
customer_reviews.author: FAD

customer_reviews.title: Basketball material
customer_reviews.text: It is like a basketball but weighted. It is perfect for medinicine ball slams and overhead throws. The bounce is great! The material is easy to grip but does not rough up your hands. I will be ordering the heavier sizes of this.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I added functional training to my workouts and this ball helps tremendously with my core exercises.. I do Les Mills Body Vive, I've replaced he vive ball with this ball. Perfect weight, easy to grip and good size.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic medicine ball. Get this one!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything that I was looking for in a medicine ball. Has great grip, size of a basketball. I have slammed it a few times during workouts and seems very durable, although that can change over time. Definitely worth the money. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: molly mendralla

customer_reviews.title: Very bouncy , good grip . Good for core work
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fitness trainer and I purchased 2 10lb balls to use with my clients. The ball has good grip, it has a basketball feel, so it won't slip from your hands when slamming or throwing. Weight is well balanced. The Yellow and black color are easy to see if your throwing to a partner. Good med ball at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: J Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Nice Medicine Balls
customer_reviews.text: These medicine balls feel like they are very durable and they have a good texture making them easy to grip. They have a nice amount of bounce to them as well. I bought a 12# ball and a 6# ball and so far I am very happy with the purchase. They are working great for me and at a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Recommendable..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for exercises at home..I like the ruggedness on the ball for better handling...
customer_reviews.author: Anil K

customer_reviews.title: Well manufactured
customer_reviews.text: Very good item. Well balanced and built for no-slip gripping. Easy on hands, with good center weightage. Can be handled by 12 year old for a variety of exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Venkatarama

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love it - I use it every day. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: JW_AmazonPRO!!!

customer_reviews.title: but the rubber allows good grip on the ball
customer_reviews.text: It does seem durable and bounces on concrete or solid wall well. It does not flex with attempts to put pressure into the ball, but the rubber allows good grip on the ball. It does exactly what I want it to do--bounce well with good durability. The 10# is a bigger challenge than I thought it would be and seems to be a good starting weight, but I will look to buy a heavier ball when needing a bigger challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Tad Buckmiller

customer_reviews.title: Good workout medicine ball.
customer_reviews.text: Good work out ball for price paid. Nice texture on ball surface for gripping. Delivered on time and overall, I happy with the brand and size purchased.
customer_reviews.author: M2

customer_reviews.title: All was a Success!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just the way it was described and looked online. Plus, arrived quickly! I will definitely buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: HighEnergy

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for my grandson to use in his off ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my grandson to use in his off season baseball work out. He says it is exactly what he was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Hank B

customer_reviews.title: Very large 15 lb medicine ball
customer_reviews.text: Bounces pretty good and nice quality. But, I have a 20 lb medicine ball (different brand) and it is the same size. My 10 lb medicine ball is much smaller. So, I expected this one to be somewhere in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like it so far
customer_reviews.text: Weighed the ball, it is exactly 8 lbs. Really like it so far! Good grip!
customer_reviews.author: Libby Torbert

customer_reviews.title: Withstands all I can throw at it.
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged nice. Use it for training with my trx. Seems sturdy and well built. It has a good bounce back too. Not like other medicine balls so be careful and don't hit yourself in the face like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ball and definitely a workout
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ball and definitely a workout. Will definitely be buying from this seller again when I'm ready for the 10lb and 12lb balls!
customer_reviews.author: Parker Jhayne

customer_reviews.title: The First Place Elite Medicine Balls are much much better.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry things busted after 2 months of normal use. The First Place Elite Medicine Balls are much much better.
customer_reviews.author: TMer286

customer_reviews.title: home gym.
customer_reviews.text: Love these weighted medicine balls. I went through weight loss surgury and now am attempting a exercise routine at gym with Trainor and having this at home really adds to program.
customer_reviews.author: monet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT DEAL, WILL LAST A LIFETIME, AND BEST PRICE AROUND
customer_reviews.author: Steven P.

customer_reviews.title: this ball is not good for slamming
customer_reviews.text: this ball is not good for slamming. I have a 8lb. that is good but this one must be to heavy for that type of activity.
customer_reviews.author: chad campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good medicine ball for my workouts. Well made. Nothing to add--that says its all.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected! The texture of the ball keeps it from slipping out of my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Received shipment timely. The ball does have a bounce to it, thankfully the bounce is not as much that it comes back up to your face like others that I have used. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Justice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Arms and Abs
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for. The color was exactually as it was in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: 2BMSALG😎😎😎

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great ball to workout with! Sturdy and perfect weight. I'm 5'4, 126lbs, and I can manage a tough but great workout!
customer_reviews.author: f. p.

customer_reviews.title: Good ball for the price
customer_reviews.text: Meets my purposes, but the ball is pretty hard, and doesn't bounce as much as those you might find in a gym. However, for the price, it gets 4-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Boje

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As described and super fast shipping. Love having gym quality medicine ball for our home workouts.
customer_reviews.author: wesurfandski

customer_reviews.title: Medicine Ball
customer_reviews.text: I love my ball. I think this ball was a little heavy at first for me at 12lbs. But I got use to it. I would have liked to get the 10lb first.
customer_reviews.author: FalishaB5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered quickly and was perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Triolo

customer_reviews.title: good bounce, grip
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for my workouts, good bounce, grip, enough weight for me when I do my sumo squats. Like what I use at the gym but now I have my own at home

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Similar to one at gym from different brand

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good medicine ball, 8 lbs is a bit much for me, but that isn't the ball's fault

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yep its a medicine ball. Not sure what more to say. Ahh it's round and it weighs 4 lbs.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, bounces when slammed on ground, creates instability for pushups, etc.

customer_reviews.title: This ball was defective lasted 6 weeks and the ball ...
customer_reviews.text: This ball was defective lasted 6 weeks and the ball split at the seam. I tried to get a replacement ball but no one responded

customer_reviews.title: Defective product.
customer_reviews.text: Ball was not heavily used. It developed a crack in the surface and was rendered useless after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: jac

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Durable, just as it looks in the photo. Not many places have a 12 lb. so it was perfect for my needs!

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: works as expected. It is a little bigger than I anticipated, but that hasn't caused any complications.

customer_reviews.title: Just what the physical therapist ordered
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful tool. My wife loves using it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it! It's perfect for my workouts
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! It's perfect for my workouts! Would highly recommend:)

customer_reviews.title: Love this ball
customer_reviews.text: Now I have ABS of steele ! Love this ball !

customer_reviews.title: review for the 12lb Wacces Medicine Ball
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love it-works great and is the right weight! Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Bad balls
customer_reviews.text: After about 30 days of use both balls split open. And now are of no use.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like at the gym. This is a high quality product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the ball, weight and gripping texture. So many ways to use it during exercising.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Received quickly after our order was placed ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Received quickly after our order was placed and it's just as it was described!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made for a perfect Father's Day gift. He was thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: BlissMom

customer_reviews.title: I'd definitely buy another
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Exactly what I was expecting with the quality and design. Quick shipping. Thank you!!! AAA!
customer_reviews.author: Lovinuslowly

customer_reviews.title: Ball is nice, feels good
customer_reviews.text: Ball is nice, feels good, however the smell is really strong. Have to store it in the garage, as smell was too strong in house. Hopefully smell will wear off in time.
customer_reviews.author: Alan W.

customer_reviews.title: Great medicine ball!
customer_reviews.text: Love this medicine ball!!!! It has a nice texture on it so it doesn't slip out of my hands, and it is very well made. I have recommended this ball to several friends who have purchased it and are equally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: is useful for multiple exercises
customer_reviews.text: The medicine ball arrived on time, is useful for multiple exercises, and is easy to grip and work with.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan H. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: The ball is nice and hard
customer_reviews.text: The ball is nice and hard. It's great for massaging the IT bands or making every vertebrae in your back come undone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my workout. Ball texture is like a basketball, making it easier to handle/better grip

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, high quality medicine ball, replacing another ball that was low quality and just as expensive.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Ball - durable and good bounce. Works great for a 10 year old golfer working on core strength.

customer_reviews.title: Quite satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this ball. Well constructed and has very good grip.

customer_reviews.title: the textured surface is nice.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say: it's a medicine ball. However, the textured surface is nice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hickey

customer_reviews.title: ... looking for a dependable ball that was balanced and easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a dependable ball that was balanced and easy to hold. This ball meets both those needs.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It cracked (virtually fell apart) the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: John Fallis

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Whether you're a trainer or just trying to get fit, if you have use for a med ball this is a perfect purchase. The ball's weight is well balanced, the grip is effective, and it's durable. With how expensive weights can be, the value for this ball is great!
customer_reviews.author: casey wood

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly like the medicine ball that I cracked the covering on ...
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly like the medicine ball that I cracked the covering on by bouncing it on the floor to see how high I could bounce it. The cover cracked when I subjected it to this abuse.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great medicine ball the weight is well distributed and it bounces

customer_reviews.title: 12 lb ball

customer_reviews.title: Simply I am pleased with the seller and shipping experience
customer_reviews.text: These mats are excellent. They are beyond my expectations. The vinyl cover is adequate for the wet tropical climate. I have never been disappointed by products purchased from Amazon the brand lives up to all my expectations

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.text: This product cracked after a few months of use. I contacted the manufacturer and they said they would replace it.

customer_reviews.title: My fault - I didn't see that it was only ...
customer_reviews.text: My fault - I didn't see that it was only a 2 lb ball - no point in having one that light.
customer_reviews.author: sklein

product_meta.title: Wacces Weighted Fitness & Medicine Ball Muscle Driver
feature_bullets: FULL-BODY WORKOUTS: Great for dynamic exercises, partner workouts, squats, overhead presses, crossfit training and more.
IMPROVED FITNESS: Helps you for building strength and stamina while challenging coordination and balance.
SUPERIOR GRIP: Provides a stable grip during intensive training that involves rotational or explosive movements.
STURDY & DURABLE: Textured rubber surface is built to last long, can bounce off hard surfaces.
COLOR CODED WEIGHTS: Available from 2 lb to 25 lb. in various colors for various strength levels and muscle groups.
